Class LangPrediction

java.lang.Object
  LangPrediction

public class LangPrediction
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a prediction made by the DLD library that is being tested by Tester.

Constructor Detail

LangPrediction

public LangPrediction()

LangPrediction

public LangPrediction(int index,
                      java.lang.String predictedLangCode,
                      java.lang.String corrLangCode,
                      long nanotime,
                      int charcount)
Parameters:
predictedLangCode - the language code expressed in iso 639-1 format.
corrLangCode - the correct language code.
nanotime - the time taken in nanoseconds for a certain detector to detect the language of a blog post.
charcount - the number of bytes of the string detected.
index - the place index within the original LinkedList produced by DocumentReader.readData(java.io.File) of the analyzed blog post.
